repairedDockerfile:
# nagios 
# 
# VERSION 1.0 
FROM tozd/postfix 
MAINTAINER Andres F. Lamilla, "aflamillac@gmail.com" 
# se actualiza la base de datos de apt 
RUN apt-get update -qq && DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt-get --no-install-recommends install -y -q wget \
build-essential \
apache2 \
apache2-utils \
iputils-ping \
php5-gd \
libapache2-mod-php5 \
libssl-dev \
unzip \
libdigest-hmac-perl \
libnet-snmp-perl \
libcrypt-des-perl \
mailutils \
python-pip && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*; # instalacion de los paquetes necesarios para la app 















COPY pre-conf.sh /sbin/pre-conf 
RUN chmod +x /sbin/pre-conf ; sync 
RUN /bin/bash -c /sbin/pre-conf && rm /sbin/pre-conf 

COPY ./etc /etc 

EXPOSE 80
